channel.title: Go Humble! RSS GAMES
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle games bundles!

item.title: IGN Gamescom Bundle 2025
item.content:encoded: Gamescom 2025 is here—and we’ve assembled a curated bundle of standout games to celebrate! Located in Cologne, Germany, Gamescom is Europe's leading gaming & tech expo—where the best in the industry gather. Rule the boroughs using speed and style in Bomb Rush Cyberfunk, blast through Antonblast's fast-paced explosive action platformer worlds, and enjoy throwback vibes with turn-based RPG gameplay in Lost Eidolons, plus more. Get the very best of Gamescom from the comfort of your home and help support DonorsChoose with your purchase!

item.title: Table Top Tag Team: Dire Wolf x Marmalade
item.content:encoded: Our latest Boardgame Bundle brings your favorite physical games to life with dynamic digital editions. Pay what you want for the very best from Direwolf and Marmalade games and let the good times roll. Make the woods your battleground in Root—a boardgame rooted in fun! Establish a railroad empire while squashing the competition in Ticket to Ride. Solve the time old question of ‘who done it’ in Clue/Cluedo: Classic Edition. Play these and more iconic boardgames—plus, a portion of your purchase helps support Whale & Dolphin Conservation.

item.title: Point Blank Bundle
item.description: Shooters in every size and flavor
item.content:encoded: Grab your guns, bullets, and wits— it’s time to feel the adrenaline rush of fantastic shooters with the Point Blank Bundle! This action-packed collection of FPS and TPS hits from top indie publishers features the tactically-sound and realistic EXFIL, the surreal alien invasion sim High on Life, and the wacky roguelike FPS Wild Bastards. Pay what you want for an amazing library of shooters and help support the American Civil Liberties Union.

item.title: WB Play the Legends
item.description: The very best from Warner Bros. Games
item.content:encoded:
Love Sub-Zero, Middle-earth, and the Bat Family? The top-selling Warner Bros. Games bundle is back! Experience genre-defining combat as the Dark Knight himself in Batman: Arkham Knight Premium Edition, go toe-to-toe as the strongest and watch the blood drip off Raiden’s fists in Mortal Kombat 11: Ultimate Edition, stop the Court of Owls from overrunning Gotham City in Gotham Knights, and more. Satisfy your superhero roleplaying fantasies and help support the Raiden Science Foundation with your purchase!

Keys expire. Please redeem your key before February 27th. 2026.

item.title: Better with 4 Friends! Co-Op Bundle
item.content:encoded: Grab your besties for a co-op game night with the all-new Better With 4 Friends Bundle! Play a variety of hilarious and wacky indie games designed to get the whole squad laughing. Lay track before the train crashes in Unrailed!, turn moving day into pure chaos in Moving Out, and battle blazes together in Embr—plus so much more. Pay what you want for this laugh-packed collection and help support the Michael J. Fox Foundation with your purchase!
